timeline.message:
chore(atomix/core): fix atomix tests

 * Use temp folders
 * use socket utility to get next free socket
chore(atomix): adjust copyright for Zeebe files

chore(atomix): finalize license plugin cfg

 License headers are only changed and added for new files which don't have a license header yet.
chore(atomix): add comment for LGTM false positive

timeline.bodyText: Can't tell if it's clever to accept a format or confusing 😅
timeline.author: npepinpe

replies.bodyText: Yeah didn't wanted to rewrite the complete stuff 🤷‍♂️
replies.author: Zelldon

timeline.message: chore(atomix): use super for method call

timeline.author: npepinpe
npepinpe

timeline.bodyText: So this will now call AbstractSession#decode instead of LogProxySession#decode, since LocalSession was a non-static inner class. I guess I don't understand the change here 🤔
timeline.author: npepinpe

replies.bodyText: The thing is it also called before the super but it was not explicit. If you inherit a method then you will call it before calling methods from outer scope. If you want to call LocalProxySession#decode you need to write. LocalProxySession.this.decode()
replies.author: Zelldon
